actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to prohibit the Authority from imposing a performance deposit on any person constructing a dock or making any other residential shoreline alteration.

summary.text: Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to prohibit the Tennessee Valley Authority from imposing a performance deposit on any person constructing a dock or making any other residential shoreline alteration.

titles.title: To amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to prohibit the Authority from imposing a performance deposit on any person constructing a dock or making any other residential shoreline alteration.
